Sentencas: Solid oxide fuel cells (SOFCs) with proton-conducting solid electrolyte, instead of the oxide-ion conducting solid electrolyte have attracted attentions because of their high potential to reduce operating temperatures and to enhance the electrical efficiencies of SOFCs.
Titulo: Suppression of Leakage Current in Proton-Conducting BaZr0.8Y0.2O3-δ Electrolyte by Forming Hole-Blocking Layer

Sentencas: In addition, the proton-conducting SOFCs with multistage electrochemical oxidation configuration will be promising technology for critically-high electric efficiencies.
Titulo: Suppression of Leakage Current in Proton-Conducting BaZr0.8Y0.2O3-δ Electrolyte by Forming Hole-Blocking Layer

Sentencas: However, it is known that there are non-negligible charge -carriers other than protons in typical proton-conducting solid oxide electrolytes at relatively high temperatures.
Titulo: Suppression of Leakage Current in Proton-Conducting BaZr0.8Y0.2O3-δ Electrolyte by Forming Hole-Blocking Layer

Sentencas: The existence of the partial conductivities of holes and/or electrons will cause the internal leakage current that consumes fuel but never generates any electrical power output.
Titulo: Suppression of Leakage Current in Proton-Conducting BaZr0.8Y0.2O3-δ Electrolyte by Forming Hole-Blocking Layer

Sentencas: The higher ratio of the leakage current to external current will more deteriorate the electrical efficiency.
Titulo: Suppression of Leakage Current in Proton-Conducting BaZr0.8Y0.2O3-δ Electrolyte by Forming Hole-Blocking Layer

Sentencas: In this study, the effects of blocking-layers formed on the air side surface of base electrolyte layer consisting of BaZr0.8Y0.2O3-delta (BZY82) for suppressing the leakage current have been investigated by using electrochemical parameters of the partial conduction of the materials.
Titulo: Suppression of Leakage Current in Proton-Conducting BaZr0.8Y0.2O3-δ Electrolyte by Forming Hole-Blocking Layer

Sentencas: The chemical potential profile and leakage current showed large dependence on the material of the blocking-layer.
Titulo: Suppression of Leakage Current in Proton-Conducting BaZr0.8Y0.2O3-δ Electrolyte by Forming Hole-Blocking Layer

Sentencas: Lanthanum tungstate was found to play a role as unique and strong blocking-layer against the leakage current.
Titulo: Suppression of Leakage Current in Proton-Conducting BaZr0.8Y0.2O3-δ Electrolyte by Forming Hole-Blocking Layer
